personalInfo.name: Aryan Sharma
personalInfo.title: AI/ML Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Passionate AI/ML Engineer with expertise in deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing. Experienced in building scalable machine learning solutions and deploying models to production.

projects.name: Image Classification System
projects.description: Built a CNN-based image classifier achieving 95% accuracy on ImageNet dataset using transfer learning with ResNet-50

projects.name: NLP Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Developed a sentiment analysis model using BERT transformers for social media data with 92% F1-score

projects.name: Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Created a collaborative filtering recommendation system serving 1M+ users with sub-100ms latency

publications.title: Evolutionary Stable Strategy enabled Resource Allocation in 6G using DL and Blockchain
publications.conference: International IEEE Asian Conference on Communication and Networks
publications.description: Developed an Evolutionary ML framework combining Evolutionarily Stable Strategies (ESS), Deep Learning, and Blockchain for efficient 6G resource allocation, achieving fairness and stability with a maximum fitness change of 13.3% by the 11th period.

publications.title: AI and Blockchain-Driven Reputation-Based Resource Allocation in 6G
publications.description: Leveraged game theory, deep learning, and blockchain to achieve transparent, fair, and low-latency spectrum allocation with secure, real-time resource optimization—resulting in an 18.8% improvement in reputation-based network performance.

experience.description:
Driving enterprise AI solutions and data infrastructure modernization, with focus on API development, intelligent automation, and cloud-based analytics platforms.
• Developed and optimized API endpoints for Databricks integration with asynchronous database management, implementing multiple endpoints for automated summary generation and data processing.
• Optimized client software through LangGraph implementation, integrated AI in medallion architecture silver notebook transformation reducing manual effort by 70%.
• Currently architecting enterprise-scale SAP data migration to Microsoft Fabric, orchestrating complex ETL pipelines and data transformation workflows to enable real-time analytics and business intelligence capabilities across the organization.

Developed solutions for enterprise clients.
• Built an end-to-end API pipeline to extract and process user information from virtual meetings, leveraging transcription, translation, and summarization using GCP, Gemini models, and Azure services.
• Designed and implemented a virtual assistant for bank loan eligibility, utilizing Knowledge Graphs and a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework to deliver accurate, context-aware responses from structured rules and documents.
• Integrated and deployed Google ASR and Azure ASR in the SARATHI voice-enabled chatbot, enabling multilingual speech input and output for rural financial users.

education.degree: BTech in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: Aspiring Machine Learning Developer with a solid foundation in Theoretical Computer Science, passionate about leveraging AI and ML to drive innovation in marketing and customer experiences. A quick learner, eager to tackle challenges and contribute to organizational growth through advanced AI solutions.
